      • checkForLucreziaBorgiaCost

        private boolean checkForLucreziaBorgiaCost(it.polimi.ingsw.GC_28.cards.LeaderCard lc)
        This method check if the card is Lucrezia Borgia if so, it check the cost conditions that are different from any other leader card.
        Parameters:
        lc - the leader card to check
        Returns:
        true if it is Lucrezia Borgia and the player can play it, false otherwise.
